articles.title: Kidnapped Gauteng man rescued in midnight raid, 3 people arrested - News24
articles.description: In a late-night swoop, police rescued businessman Zaheer Asmal in Lenasia South, Gauteng.
articles.content:
• Police rescued Zaheer Asmal in Lenasia South, Gauteng.
  • He was kidnapped outside his business premises last week.

articles.title: Malaysian actress' face smashed by 6kg bowling ball in wheelchair accident - AsiaOne
